Presidential Box.Description: Exclusive seating area offering the best view and luxury experience at Reale Arena.
Presidential Box.View_Quality: Central view from the best vantage point, exceptionally immersive.
Presidential Box.Unique_Features: Luxury seating, highest level of privacy and exclusivity.
Presidential Box.Accessibility: VIP access with personal assistance, best access routes.
Presidential Box.Special_Perks: Gourmet dining options, meet-and-greet opportunities with players.

VIP Seats.Description: Premium seats with excellent pitch views and exclusive benefits, ensuring an unforgettable match day experience.
VIP Seats.View_Quality: Unmatched side views, close to the action.
VIP Seats.Unique_Features: Comfortable seating, complimentary snacks and beverages.
VIP Seats.Special_Perks: Access to VIP lounges, special events invitations.

Grandstand.Description: Elevated side views for an optimal viewing experience, combining great visibility and value.
Grandstand.View_Quality: Excellent perspective of the entire pitch, clear line of sight.
Grandstand.Unique_Features: Good balance of view quality and ticket price.
Grandstand.Accessibility: Easy access, available facilities for guests with disabilities.
Grandstand.Special_Perks: A popular choice among regular fans for its great value.

General Admission.Description: Affordable tickets providing access to vibrant atmosphere areas, perfect for die-hard fans.
General Admission.View_Quality: Dynamic view of the game, engaging fan experience.
General Admission.Unique_Features: Access to the heart of the fan sections, lively atmosphere.
General Admission.Accessibility: Standard access, dedicated areas for wheelchair users.
General Admission.Special_Perks: Part of the passionate fan base, traditional stadium experience.

restaurants_bars.name: Arzak
restaurants_bars.address: Av Alcalde Elósegui, 273, 20015 Donostia, Gipuzkoa, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: A Michelin three-starred restaurant offering innovative Basque cuisine by renowned chef Juan Mari Arzak and his daughter Elena Arzak.

restaurants_bars.name: Borda Berri
restaurants_bars.address: Calle Fermín Calbetón, 12, 20003 Donostia, Gipuzkoa, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: A bustling pintxos bar known for its creative takes on traditional Basque dishes, where everything is cooked to order.

restaurants_bars.name: Gandarias Jatetxea
restaurants_bars.address: Calle 31 de Agosto, 23, 20003 Donostia, Gipuzkoa, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: A popular restaurant in the Old Town offering a wide selection of pintxos, local wines, and traditional Basque dishes.

restaurants_bars.name: La Cuchara de San Telmo
restaurants_bars.address: Calle 31 de Agosto, 28, 20003 Donostia, Gipuzkoa, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: Famous for its innovative pintxos and small plates, this place is a must-visit for foodies looking to experience the best of San Sebastián's gastronomy.

restaurants_bars.name: Bar Nestor
restaurants_bars.description: Best known for its tortilla española, chuleta (steak), and tomatoes salad, this bar offers a quintessential San Sebastián dining experience.

restaurants_bars.name: Atari Gastroteka
restaurants_bars.description: Situated near the Basilica of Saint Mary of the Chorus, Atari Gastroteka is famed for its pintxos, cocktails, and lively atmosphere.

accommodations.name: Hotel Maria Cristina
accommodations.address: Paseo República Argentina, 4, 20004 Donostia, Gipuzkoa, Spain
accommodations.description: A luxury hotel located near the Concha Beach, offering elegant rooms and exceptional service, within walking distance to San Sebastián's main attractions.

accommodations.name: NH Collection San Sebastián Aránzazu
accommodations.description: Situated in the Antiguo neighborhood, close to Ondarreta Beach, this hotel offers modern accommodations and is conveniently located for exploring the city.

accommodations.name: Barceló Costa Vasca
accommodations.address: Av. de pío Baroja, 15, 20008 Donostia, Gipuzkoa, Spain
accommodations.description: This hotel features contemporary rooms and a seasonal outdoor pool, located just a short walk from Ondarreta Beach and the Miramar Palace.

accommodations.name: Mercure Monte Igueldo
accommodations.address: Paseo del Faro, 134, 20008 Donostia, Gipuzkoa, Spain
accommodations.description: Set on Mount Igueldo offering spectacular views over the Bay of Biscay, this hotel is known for its unique location and traditional Basque cuisine.

accommodations.name: Hotel Astoria7
accommodations.address: Sagrada Familia Kalea, 1, 20010 Donostia, Gipuzkoa, Spain
accommodations.description: Themed around cinema and the San Sebastián Film Festival, this stylish hotel offers a unique stay in the city, with a library and a movie screening room.

accommodations.name: Hotel de Londres y de Inglaterra
accommodations.description: A classic hotel with a beautiful facade overlooking La Concha Beach, offering refined rooms and a beachfront terrace bar.

tourist_attractions.name: La Concha Beach
tourist_attractions.address: De la Concha Ibilbidea, 20007 Donostia, Gipuzkoa, Spain
tourist_attractions.description: Renowned for its stunning beauty, La Concha Beach is one of the most famous urban beaches in Europe, offering spectacular views of the bay and surrounding hills.

tourist_attractions.name: Monte Igueldo
tourist_attractions.address: Paseo del Faro, 20008 Donostia, Gipuzkoa, Spain
tourist_attractions.description: A mountain offering the best views of San Sebastián, accessible by a century-old funicular. At the top, visitors can find an amusement park and the iconic lighthouse.

tourist_attractions.name: Parte Vieja (Old Town)
tourist_attractions.description: The heart of San Sebastián, known for its narrow streets, vibrant pintxos bars, and historical buildings, including the San Vicente Church and the San Telmo Museum.

tourist_attractions.name: Aquarium Donostia-San Sebastián
tourist_attractions.address: Plaza Carlos Blasco Imaz, 1, 20003 Donostia, Gipuzkoa, Spain
tourist_attractions.description: Located at the port, this aquarium is part of the Oceanographic Society of Gipuzkoa and offers a journey through maritime history and local marine life.

tourist_attractions.name: Peine del Viento
tourist_attractions.address: Eduardo Chillida Pasealekua, 20008 Donostia, Gipuzkoa, Spain
tourist_attractions.description: A set of sculptures by Eduardo Chillida, located at the end of Ondarreta Beach, where the sea interacts with art creating a unique landscape.

tourist_attractions.name: Miramar Palace
tourist_attractions.description: Formerly a royal residence, this palace stands between La Concha and Ondarreta beaches, offering beautiful gardens and spectacular views over the bay.

team_related_activities.name: Real Sociedad Official Store at Reale Arena
team_related_activities.description: The official store for Real Sociedad merchandise, offering a wide range of team apparel and accessories right at the Reale Arena.

team_related_activities.name: Real Sociedad Match Day Experience
team_related_activities.address: Reale Arena, Anoeta Pasealekua, 1, 20014 Donostia, Gipuzkoa, Spain
team_related_activities.description: Attend a Real Sociedad game at the Reale Arena to experience the passion and atmosphere of one of La Liga's ambitious teams.

team_related_activities.name: Real Sociedad Football Camp
team_related_activities.description: Football camps for young fans and aspiring players, offering coaching and training in the sport under the guidance of Real Sociedad professionals.

team_related_activities.name: Meet & Greet with Real Sociedad Players
team_related_activities.description: Special events organized for fans to meet their favorite Real Sociedad players, get autographs, and take photos.

team_related_activities.name: Real Sociedad Community Outreach Programs
team_related_activities.address: Various community centers and schools in San Sebastián
team_related_activities.description: Community programs and initiatives led by Real Sociedad, promoting sportsmanship, teamwork, and football among youth in San Sebastián.

options.description: San Sebastián's city bus network, Dbus, offers convenient access to Reale Arena, with several lines stopping near the stadium. This provides easy access for visitors coming to see a match or visit the team store.
options.directions: Check the Dbus website for bus schedules, routes, and real-time updates.

options.description: The Euskotren railway network can be used to reach the stadium from various parts of the city and surrounding areas, with the Anoeta station being the closest stop.
options.directions: For directions and detailed schedules, visit the Euskotren website or use their mobile app.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official Team Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The primary source for all ticket sales, offering guaranteed authenticity and the best seat selections for Real Sociedad games.

best_places_to_buy.name: Ticket Office at Reale Arena
best_places_to_buy.description: Purchase tickets directly from the ticket office at Reale Arena for a personal touch and last-minute availability.

best_places_to_buy.name: Resale Platforms
best_places_to_buy.description: Check reputable resale platforms for tickets, especially for sold-out games. Ensure the platform offers buyer protection and verifies the authenticity of tickets.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Look for family packages or group discounts for savings. Mid-week games may offer lower prices compared to weekend games. Sign up for the team's newsletter for promotional deals.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Purchase tickets from official sources or reputable platforms to avoid scams. Be cautious of offers that seem too good to be true, and verify the authenticity of tickets when buying from resale sites.
